name: Darius I (Persian king)
blurb: Persian ruler whose regnal year dates Haggai’s messages. His administration frames Yehud’s provincial realities.
searchText: darius i (persian king) person monarch persian ruler whose regnal year dates haggai’s messages. his administration frames yehud’s provincial realities.

name: Haggai
blurb: Post-exilic prophet whose oracles in 520 BCE catalyze the Temple rebuild through rebuke, encouragement, legal clarification, and royal promise.
searchText: haggai person prophet post-exilic prophet whose oracles in 520 bce catalyze the temple rebuild through rebuke, encouragement, legal clarification, and royal promise.

name: Priests
blurb: Priestly establishment implicated in syncretism and compromise.

name: Jerusalem
blurb: City of corruption and eventual renewal; site of leadership failure and divine rejoicing.
searchText: jerusalem group city-people city of corruption and eventual renewal; site of leadership failure and divine rejoicing.

name: Altar
blurb: Sacrificial center implying need for purity; background to holiness/defilement diagnosis.

name: Twenty-fourth day
blurb: Repeated day-mark that punctuates restart of work and covenant blessing.
searchText: twenty-fourth day entity calendar-day repeated day-mark that punctuates restart of work and covenant blessing.

name: Superscription & date frame
blurb: Four time-stamped oracles in Darius’s second year (520 BCE) providing a precise historical scaffold.

name: Joshua (Jeshua) son of Jehozadak
blurb: High priest partnering with Zerubbabel. Central to ritual purity and the legitimation of the rebuilt Temple.
searchText: joshua (jeshua) son of jehozadak person high-priest high priest partnering with zerubbabel. central to ritual purity and the legitimation of the rebuilt temple.

name: Scribes/Recorders

name: Temple (Second Temple)
blurb: Central project of Haggai; locus of divine pleasure, glory, and peace.
searchText: temple (second temple) entity cultic central project of haggai; locus of divine pleasure, glory, and peace.

name: Spirit of the LORD
blurb: Stirs Zerubbabel, Joshua, and the remnant to obey and work—personal presence empowering communal renewal.
searchText: spirit of the lord divine divine-agency stirs zerubbabel, joshua, and the remnant to obey and work—personal presence empowering communal renewal.

name: Elders/Heads of fathers’ houses

name: Heavens/Earth/Sea/Dry land (cosmic set)
blurb: The entire created order addressed in the shaking—signals theophanic sovereignty.
